question: At the Central level, the subject of ‘urban local government’ is dealt with by which among the following Ministry?
explanation:
At the Central/Union level, the subject of ‘urban local government’ is dealt with by the following three ministries:
(i) Ministry of Urban Development which was created as a separate ministry in 1985.
(ii) Ministry of Defence in the case of cantonment boards
(iii) Ministry of Home Affairs which is in the case of Union Territories
